mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pw, name, email_id, email_site, phone1, phone2, phone3, postcode, address1, address2, address3, smsPush, emailPush, useCount, handler) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name},#{email_id}, #{email_site},#{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3},#{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3},#{smsPush}, #{emailPush}, #{useCount},#{handler})

UPDATE member SET pw = #{pw} WHERE id=#{id}
